name: Golden Nugget
overview: Immerse yourself in the GOLDEN NUGGET and you'll enjoy Las Vegas-style casino gaming the way it's meant to be played - in a four-star casino paradise with 16 games of chance to challenge and thrill you. Explore the lavish and elegant surroundings of the legendary GOLDEN NUGGET. Play Blackjack and Poker. Try your hand at Roulette and Craps.
